sentence.Network_en: Always distinguish hyperlinked text from normal body text. Don't forget to differentiate visited and unvisited links.
sentence.Network_cn: 区分超链接文本与通常的实体文本, 同时区分已浏览链接和未浏览链接.

auth_sentence.content: But why copy second-rate academic works that linger in the unvisited galleries or basements of the world's museums?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But why copy second-rate academic works that linger in the unvisited galleries or basements of the world's museums?
